body_content.explanation: (of a team, etc.) not belonging to one of a country's main professional leagues (= groups of sports teams who compete against each other):
examples: For a non-league team to beat Chelsea was an amazing result.
He has visited many small non-league football grounds.

body_content.explanation: not taking place within or belonging to the same league (= a group of teams who compete against each other) :
examples: They have a nonleague game scheduled for next week against a team visiting from upstate.
